future_history: There will be many battles over the ringworlds of the planet Tokl in the 24th century. The Mentors approve a loan to the Search-Conv Corps, a salvage company.
untold_adventures: Immediately prior to this, the Doctor and Peri were on Thordon, where the warlords were being supplied phasers by Thoros Beta.
additional_notes: Fashion Victims: Peri's white stilettos. Very 80s. Everybody's eye make-up. Double Entendres: 'We had to act!'
bottom_line: Good design. The script tries to be comic, grotesque, straight and farcical all at the same time, and, directed without much thought, falls between several stools. Things happen really slowly, though Brian Blessed's way-over-the-top performance helps. We're glad Peri didn't die, though, because, dramatic as it is, it's also a stupid way to go. Crozier's sip of tea before saving Kiv is way-cool.
